verses.verse: And Yosef <WH3130> was brought down <WH3381> <WH8717> to Egypt <WH4714>; and Potiphar <WH6318>, an officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, captain <WH8269> of the guard <WH2876>, an Egyptian <WH376> <WH4713>, bought <WH7069> <WH8799> him of the hands <WH3027> of the Ishmeelites <WH3459>, which had brought him down <WH3381> <WH8689> thither.
And the YY <WH3068> was with Yosef <WH3130>, and he was a prosperous <WH6743> <WH8688> man <WH376>; and he was in the house <WH1004> of his master <WH113> the Egyptian <WH4713>.
And his master <WH113> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the YY <WH3068> was with him, and that the YY <WH3068> made all that he did <WH6213> <WH8802> to prosper <WH6743> <WH8688> in his hand <WH3027>.

And Yosef <WH3130> found <WH4672> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> in his sight <WH5869>, and he served <WH8334> <WH8762> him: and he made him overseer <WH6485> <WH8686> over his house <WH1004>, and all that he had <WH3426> he put <WH5414> <WH8804> into his hand <WH3027>.

And it came to pass from the time <WH227> that he had made him overseer <WH6485> <WH8689> in his house <WH1004>, and over all that he had <WH3426>, that the YY <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the Egyptian's <WH4713> house <WH1004> for Yosef's <WH3130> sake <WH1558>; and the b'rakhah <WH1293> of the YY <WH3068> was upon all that he had <WH3426> in the house <WH1004>, and in the field <WH7704>.

And he left <WH5800> <WH8799> all that he had in Yosef's <WH3130> hand <WH3027>; and he knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not ought <WH3972> he had, save <WH518> the bread <WH3899> which he did eat <WH398> <WH8802>. And Yosef <WH3130> was a goodly <WH8389> person, and well <WH3303> favoured <WH4758>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that his master's <WH113> wife <WH802> cast <WH5375> <WH8799> her eyes <WH5869> upon Yosef <WH3130>; and she said <WH559> <WH8799>, Lie <WH7901> <WH8798> with me.

But he refused <WH3985> <WH8762>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his master's <WH113> wife <WH802>, Behold, my master <WH113> wotteth <WH3045> <WH8804> not what is with me in the house <WH1004>, and he hath committed <WH5414> <WH8804> all that he hath <WH3426> to my hand <WH3027>;

There is none greater <WH1419> in this house <WH1004> than I; neither <WH3808> hath he kept back <WH2820> <WH8804> any thing <WH3972> from me but thee, because <WH834> thou <WH859> art his wife <WH802>: how then can I do <WH6213> <WH8799> this great <WH1419> wickedness <WH7451>, and sin <WH2398> <WH8804> against 'Elohim <WH430> ?

And it came to pass, as she spake <WH1696> <WH8763> to Yosef <WH3130> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117>, that he hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto her, to lie <WH7901> <WH8800> by her <WH681>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this time <WH3117>, that Yosef went <WH935> <WH8799> into the house <WH1004> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> his business <WH4399>; and there was none of the men <WH376> <WH582> of the house <WH1004> there within.

And she caught <WH8610> <WH8799> him by his garment <WH899>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Lie <WH7901> <WH8798> with me: and he left <WH5800> <WH8799> his garment <WH899> in her hand <WH3027>, and fled <WH5127> <WH8799>, and got <WH3318> <WH8799> him out <WH2351>.
And it came to pass, when she saw <WH7200> <WH8800> that he had left <WH5800> <WH8804> his garment <WH899> in her hand <WH3027>, and was fled <WH5127> <WH8799> forth <WH2351>,

That she called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the men <WH582> of her house <WH1004>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, he hath brought in <WH935> <WH8689> an Hebrew <WH376> <WH5680> unto us to mock <WH6711> <WH8763> us; he came in <WH935> <WH8804> unto me to lie <WH7901> <WH8800> with me, and I cried <WH7121> <WH8799> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>:

And it came to pass, when he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> that I lifted up <WH7311> <WH8689> my voice <WH6963> and cried <WH7121> <WH8799>, that he left <WH5800> <WH8799> his garment <WH899> with me <WH681>, and fled <WH5127> <WH8799>, and got him <WH3318> <WH8799> out <WH2351>.
And she laid up <WH3240> <WH8686> his garment <WH899> by her <WH681>, until his lord <WH113> came <WH935> <WH8800> home <WH1004>.

And she spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him according to these words <WH1697>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The Hebrew <WH5680> servant <WH5650>, which thou hast brought <WH935> <WH8689> unto us, came in <WH935> <WH8804> unto me to mock <WH6711> <WH8763> me:

And it came to pass, as I lifted up <WH7311> <WH8687> my voice <WH6963> and cried <WH7121> <WH8799>, that he left <WH5800> <WH8799> his garment <WH899> with me <WH681>, and fled <WH5127> <WH8799> out <WH2351>.

And it came to pass, when his master <WH113> heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the words <WH1697> of his wife <WH802>, which she spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, After this manner <WH1697> did <WH6213> <WH8804> thy servant <WH5650> to me; that his wrath <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799>.

And Yosef's <WH3130> master <WH113> took <WH3947> <WH8799> him, and put him <WH5414> <WH8799> into the prison <WH1004> <WH5470>, a place <WH4725> where the king's <WH4428> prisoners <WH615> were bound <WH631> <WH8803>: and he was there in the prison <WH1004> <WH5470>.

But the YY <WH3068> was with Yosef <WH3130>, and shewed <WH5186> <WH8799> him mercy <WH2617>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him favour <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> <WH5470>.

And the keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> <WH5470> committed <WH5414> <WH8799> to Yosef's <WH3130> hand <WH3027> all the prisoners <WH615> that were in the prison <WH1004> <WH5470>; and whatsoever they did <WH6213> <WH8802> there, he was the doer <WH6213> <WH8802> of it.

The keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> <WH5470> looked <WH7200> <WH8802> not to any thing <WH3972> that was under his hand <WH3027>; because the YY <WH3068> was with him, and that which he did <WH6213> <WH8802>, the YY <WH3068> made it to prosper <WH6743> <WH8688>.
